# FractionalFlow { #ribasim.FractionalFlow }

`FractionalFlow()`

Receives a fraction of the flow. The fractions must sum to 1.0 for a furcation.

## Parameters

| Name     | Type             | Description                             | Default   |
|----------|------------------|-----------------------------------------|-----------|
| `static` | pandas.DataFrame | Table with the constant flow fractions. | required  |
